## GlEntityRenderer class

Webgl / webgl2 entity renderer implementation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class GlEntityRenderer<TCtx extends TGlContext, TExts extends TGlExtensionKeys> implements IGlEntityRenderer<TCtx, TExts>, IGlEntityInstancedRenderer, IGlEntityVAORenderer 
```
